name: Lasers (AP_COOL)
description:
Lasers is a game of precision and quick thinking. You will have to maneuver through lasers that increase in speed as time goes by, all while moving around the arena and collecting coins to get bonus points. If you get hit, you die.

To learn the player movement, click the Help button in the main menu.

This in game is still in development. The developer would love to get your feedback on the game so he can make improvements. No suggestion is dumb.

================================================================
